Name: -1_false news_long term_sensitive content_problematic content
Representation: ['false news', 'long term', 'sensitive content', 'problematic content', 'meaningful connections', 'meaningful relationships', 'current model', 'bad content', '', '']
Representative_Docs: ["Let me be clear on this, that people do not want false news or hate speech or bullying or any of the bad content that we're talking about", "Some of this is focused on removing false news, hate speech, bullying, and other problematic content that we don't want in our community", 'But ultimately, if you want to get those high-quality judgments today on sensitive content and you want to do it quickly when the stakes are pretty high in terms of taking down content or leaving things up, and we take that extremely seriously, you want people to be looking at that']

Name: 0_long term_technical achievement_renewable energy_new threats
Representation: ['long term', 'technical achievement', 'renewable energy', 'new threats', 'new data', 'scientific advances', 'national security', 'major tech', 'major data', 'important parts']
Representative_Docs: ["We already have about 10,000 people working on safety and security, and we're planning to double that to 20,000 in the next year to better enforce our community standards and review ads", "We're going from 10,000 people working on safety and security to more than doubling that to 20,000. We're building – we're doubling – in some cases more – our engineering teams focused on security", "We're also working with other tech companies to help identify and respond to new threats because, as we've now seen, if there's a national security threat involving the Internet, it will affect many of the major tech companies, and we've announced a number of steps to help keep this kind of interference off our platform"]

Name: 1_social interaction_daily actives_specific type_specific community
Representation: ['social interaction', 'daily actives', 'specific type', 'specific community', 'social content', 'social capital', 'whole industries', 'similar interests', 'public consumption', 'greater sense']
Representative_Docs: ['We recently launched the Watch tab, where you can discover shows, follow creators, connect with people watching an episode, and join groups with people with similar interests to build community', "So we're going to continue investing heavily in video content for Watch that is centered around people, that is centered around the things that people want to talk and connect around, that give people a sense of pride and bring people together", "And we've certainly found on the Internet and YouTube and in other places that there are whole industries around creators with different cost structures than traditional Hollywood folks who can produce very informative and engaging content that a lot of people like and enjoy and that builds communities and that helps people connect together in a way that definitely can be supported by this ad model"]

Name: 2_bad actors_terrorist propaganda_serious issue_bad behavior
Representative_Docs: ["So the AI tools that we've built can enable a system to look at millions of pieces of content and make rough assessments on them and figure out what to flag for people", 'We can do a lot to help people connect through phones and computers, but so much more will be possible in a world where everyone has Internet access, where AI improves all our services, and where we can basically teleport anywhere or be with anyone anytime we want', "So earlier in the year, when we were working on problems like seeing issues when people were going live, there was this really serious issue around people with self-harm and in some cases suicide on Live, and we made an investment in AI tools and in dramatically increasing the staffing of the team that was working on that and brought the amount of time to review those Live videos down through a combination of those things to – I think it's under 10 minutes now"]
